pkgmetadata.longdescription:
cl-irc is a Common Lisp IRC client library that features (partial) DCC, CTCP and all relevant commands from the IRC RFCs (RFC2810, RFC2811 and RFC2812). Features
* implements all commands in the RFCs * extra convenience commands such as op/deop, ban, ignore, etc. * partial DCC SEND/CHAT support * event driven model with hooks makes interfacing easy * the user can keep multiple connections * all CTCP commands
